definition: towards/to face/to turn towards/direction/to support/to side with/shortly before/formerly/always/all along/(suffix) suitable for .../oriented to ...
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: Things that never smile to the sun with thanksgiving cannot be flowers.
sentences.chinese: 不會向太陽微笑感恩之物絕非向陽花。

sentences.english: The scene inspired his painting The Sun-flowers.
sentences.chinese: 這一場面啓發他畫出“向陽花”。
